meanings.definition: Yarrs (verb): makes a loud, harsh cry
meanings.sent1: The pirate yarrs loudly to signal his crew.
meanings.sent2: She yarrs in pain when she stubs her toe.
meanings.sent3: The parrot yarrs along with the thunderstorm outside.
meanings.sent4: The alarm clock yarrs at me to wake up every morning.
meanings.sent5: The lion yarrs to assert its dominance in the jungle.

meanings.definition: Yarrs (noun): a loud, harsh cry or shout
meanings.sent1: The yarrs of the pirate echoed across the sea.
meanings.sent2: His yarrs of frustration could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The yarrs of the baby in the supermarket made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The yarrs of the protesters filled the streets with passion.
meanings.sent5: The yarrs of the banshee sent shivers down my spine.
